1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: De Vloek van Manege Pegasus (TV Series 2016)

1.plot: Rob moves with his family to the Pegasus stables. Nena feels uncomfortable there, noticing that the horses are nervous, but her brother Niek dismisses her concerns. The local villagers warn them to leave or face the curse of Pegasus.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: De Vloek van Manege Pegasus (TV Series 2016)

2.plot: At night, Nena sees a mysterious horse riding in the woods, but Niek misses it and doubts it was there at all. They learn more about the curse on the Pegasus stables: the original owner died in a fire and his horse now haunts the woods.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: De Vloek van Manege Pegasus (TV Series 2016)

3.plot: Nena and Niek learn that according to the legend, the curse is made up of five disasters: the blood is only the first. That night, the whole family is awoken by a disturbance and find the stables infested with rats.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: De Vloek van Manege Pegasus (TV Series 2016)

4.plot: Lucy finally starts to talk to Nena, but when the pair ride into the woods, a mysterious rider appears from nowhere and startles them, causing Lucy to lose control of her horse. Nena suspects that the rider was the ghost of Aerink.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: De Vloek van Manege Pegasus (TV Series 2016)

5.plot: Nena and Niek learn that each previous owner of the stables was killed in a way that seems to coincide with the villagers' rhyme about the curse. The family wonder if the curse may be real after all and begin to fear the fifth disaster.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: De Vloek van Manege Pegasus (TV Series 2016)

6.plot: After the fire, the family are surprised to see Mak riding a horse. Mak reveals that he is actually a jockey, and that he stole the horse to avoid being separated when the owner sold it. Slowly the truth behind the curse is explained.

imdb.plot outline: After an accident leaves him unable to ride horses competitively, former showjumping champion Rob moves with his family to the Pegasus stables, hoping to establish a successful stud farm there. Despite their father's enthusiasm, Nena and Niek find that the farm is rather old and run-down, and the local villagers are unfriendly towards them. They are warned that Pegasus is cursed: ever since the original owner died in a fire, the ghost of his horse roams the woods and disaster has befallen all subsequent owners. Although the others dismiss the curse as a joke, Nena soon starts to suspect that there may be something to it after all.
imdb.title: De Vloek van Manege Pegasus
plot: Nena and Niek move with their family to the old run-down Pegasus stables, but soon learn that the farm is cursed: ever since the original owner died, the ghost of his horse roams the woods and disaster has befallen all subsequent owners.::Phil G
